question: What kind of support do you provide?
answer: Our plan is to mentoring students for one academic years and provide some courses in yearly basis. During this time we evaluate their profile, upgrade their CV, Linkedin, Portfolio, SOP, Research Proposal and provide 1 to 1 mentoring sessions. Also we suggest them university, program, and scholarships based on their profile. So, based on your course selection, we will guide you to achieve your goals.

question: Do you provide any financial support like bank loans or funds?
answer: No, we don't provide any financial support. We only guide the students to prepare those.

question: In which platform do you mentor the students?
answer: Google Meet, Zoom, Microsoft Teams etc.

question: Can I pay your mentoring fees in installments?
answer: You can pay the complete mentoring course fees (150 euros) in 2 installments. For others you need to pay once.
